name: Scripture
description:
The child king actually brought back the gods who were raised by priests. He won the respect of the people, but there are those who have their eyes on the throne. Join this adventure as a god. Travel through ancient Egyptian towns. Where will this thing end? Complete the priest's quests. Be careful while completing it, you must craft your equipment. You have to choose your class Mage? Hunter? Or Warrior?

Walk in the desert. Gather ore. Hunt the Aton Priests. Watch out for wolves as you roam. Tutankhamon needs you.

Explore the labyrinth in Khufu's pyramid.

As God, will you be able to protect Egypt?

Scripture gives you the core RPG experience.
